languageKey.label: Template-based Display
Template-based display are Data Consumers for Tesseract that use HTML template with a maker syntax close to the one used by TYPO3.
This field is not actively used inside Tesseract.
This field is not considered by the existing components of Tesseract. It could be used to give a visual indication of an obsolete filter. May be used actively in the future or remove altogether.

HTML template
The template for the rendering.

The HTML template is used for the rendering of the data coming from the Data Provider. The HTML can be typed directly into this field or a file can be referenced with the following syntax:
FILE:fileadmin/templates/tesseract/foo.html
The base syntax involves markers similar to those used in traditional TYPO3 templates. The most useful elements are the loops, which will iterate on all elements from a given table, and the field markers which can be mapped to a given field from the table. Please refer to the manual for more information.
